welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mamoudzou, Mayotte! Get ready to explore the charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dzaoudzi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Dzaoudzi Airport offers exclusive services for premium passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'Dzaoudzi Airport Wifi' and following the instructions.
